heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial_1_content: Scriptura has transformed my Bible study routine. It makes exploring Scripture interactive and deeply personal.
testimonial_2_content: Thanks to Scriptura, I feel more connected to the Word than ever before. The AI insights are spot on!
testimonial_3_content: The community and tools at Scriptura have enriched my faith journey. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking spiritual growth.
